text.tspan: - Rich OS Zero confidence in it
- Use to filter messages from the other CPU
Main objective is to send a message from 1 to 6.
- Being able to to earn root right with privilege escalation from 1 to 2.
- Send a RPC command from 2 to 3 to make 3 enter ther debug mode.
- Re write 3 to be able to send message from 2 to 4.
- If the messages are well written they can pass to 6.
What 5 is doing to stop fraudulent messages?
-> What to do then to bypass 5 if 1-2-3 is compromize.
